titles.title: Child Support Works Act of 2020
Child Support Works Act of 2020

A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to allow States to receive Federal matching payments for mandatory work activity programs for noncustodial parents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Child Support Works Act of 2020 This bill provides reimbursements to states that choose to implement mandatory work activity programs for noncustodial parents who have been ordered to participate in such activities under a state child support order.
